levels.description: Attack range <@ba.vup>increased</>, Trait effect increased by <@ba.vup>{trait_up}</>x (trait multiplier <@ba.vup>{per_kill_reduce:0%}</> for each enemy defeated), attacks hit <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage. When any enemy within range is attacked by a Kazimierz Operator, deal an extra <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Młynar ATK as <@ba.vup>True</> damage.
